name: UnisenzaPlus
0:
”Alexa, what is living room temperature”
”Alexa, change living room to heating”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill helps in discovering the Purmo smart devices and controlling their settings in US region.
User will need to use Alexa App(US) and login with their registered purmo account to discover their purmo smart devices and once discover is successful will be able to control their settings via Alexa App.
